Summary: Web components are a powerful new tool to web development, and knockout makes it available rignt now before the spec is even implemented in browsers.
VcardExample: Here's a simple vcard web component
JavascriptExample: Make a javacript file and import your template
RegisterExample: Now Register with knockout. I do this in a single file which holds all registrations
UsageExample: Use a vcard tag and pass in some parameters. I've made it so mine can simply take an object, but you can also set each parameter individually.
